Source code for maxaibase.model.H2O.h2o_regressor

from abc import ABC, abstractmethod
from pysparkling.ml import H2OGridSearch
from maxairesources.logging.logger import get_logger
from pyspark.ml import Pipeline, PipelineModel

from maxaibase.model.H2O.h2o_base import H2OBaseModel
from maxaimetadata.maxflow import MaxFlow

logger = get_logger(__name__)


[docs]class H2ORegressorBaseModel(H2OBaseModel):
    """
    runs regression model 
    """
    def __init__(self):
        self.run = None
        try:
            self.run = MaxFlow.get_active_flow().get_active_run()
        except:
            pass


[docs]    @abstractmethod
    def build(self, params:dict):
        raise NotImplementedError()



[docs]    def get_model(self):
        
        if isinstance(self.model, PipelineModel):
            return self.model.stages[0]
        else:
            return self.model



[docs]    def get_params(self):
        """
        gets the params
        returns:
            parameters and parameter grid
        """
        return {"params": self.params, "param_grid": self.param_grid}



[docs]    def optimise_model(self):
        """
        optimises model by using H2O Grid Search
        """
        # initialize H2O Grid search
        grid = (
            H2OGridSearch()
            .setHyperParameters(self.param_grid)
            .setAlgo(self.model)
            .setStrategy("Cartesian")
        )
        pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[grid])
        self.model = pipeline.fit(self.data)
        
        if self.run:
            if ((self.param_grid != "") and (bool(self.param_grid)) and (self.param_grid is not None)):
                self.run.log_params({'param_grid': self.param_grid})
                logger.info('Model {} optimized successfully on param grid'.format(self.model.__class__.__name__),
                            extra = {'param_grid': self.param_grid})
            self.run.log_params(self.best_params())
            logger.info('Model {} trained successfully on best parameters'.format(self.model.__class__.__name__),
                        extra = self.best_params())
                    
        if self.run:
            self.run.log_model(self)



[docs]    def fit(self, data):
        """
        fits the model to the data and calls optimise_model function
        """
        self.data = data
        self.optimise_model()



[docs]    def predict(self, data):
        """
        makes prediction on the data 
        Returns:
            data with prediction column
        """
        # Making predictions
        if not self.model:
            raise Exception("load model before calling predict")
        data = self.model.transform(data)
        return data




[docs]    def get_model_diagnostics(self):
        # spark classification metrics
        pass
